## BlendMode type

Blend mode for combining X and Y gradients in 2D space.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type BlendMode = 
/** Multiply the RGB channels of both gradients */
'multiply'
/** Apply overlay blend mode (combination of multiply and screen) */
 | 'overlay'
/** Average the RGB channels of both gradients */
 | 'average';
```
